articles.title: What to expect from America's third year of COVID - Axios
articles.description: After a devastating Omicron surge, life may finally be able to resemble normal.
articles.content:
America's third year of dealing with the pandemic is likely to start as bleak as ever, with a devastating Omicron surge for the first couple of months.

articles.title: Holland America cruise skips Mexico stop after positive Covid-19 tests - NBC News
articles.description: A Holland America cruise ship was on its way back to port Saturday after it was rejected by Mexican health officials following positive Covid-19 tests on board.
